skills.desc: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Sepulcher Shield

skills.desc: Has a 25% chance of completely blocking incoming damage when an ally is attacked. Occurs once per turn. Will only block damage for the targeted ally if multiple allies are attacked at the same time.
